skills.name: TWISTED CROSS
desc: • Deals physical damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Remove Negative Effects, including Silver Effects, from each ally.
• 35% Chance to inflict Perfect Crave on the target for 2 turns.

skills.name: DISPUTES OF DOCTRINE
desc: • Reduce Beneficial Effect Duration on all enemies by 1 turn.
• Inflict Perfect Disable on all enemies for 1 turn.
• Revive a random ally with full HP.

skills.name: THE PAPACY
desc: Grant Endure and Perfect Immunity to all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle. Grant Immunity to Heal Block and Heal Reduction effects.
